in.srain.cube.image

Class ImageLoader.LoadImageTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.srain.cube.concurrent.SimpleTask
      • in.srain.cube.image.ImageLoader.LoadImageTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    ImageLoader

    public static class ImageLoader.LoadImageTask
extends SimpleTask
    Inner class to process the image loading task in background threads.

    Memory required: Shadow heap size: 24(Parent class, SimpleTask) + 4 * 3 = 36. Align to 40 bytes. Retained heap size: 40 + 24(AtomicInteger introduced by SimpleTask = 64 bytes.
